subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
organizations: New York State Court of Appeals
lead_paragraph: The New York State Court of Appeals ruled that BMW Oracle, the American-based syndicate that represents Golden Gate Yacht Club in San Francisco, should be restored as the challenger of record for the America’s Cup, the oldest major trophy in international sport. The unanimous decision overturned a ruling last year that would have allowed the Spanish-based yacht club Club Nautico Español de Vela to remain the primary challenger to Alinghi, the Swiss defending champion.
